divs: sighting detailson december 12, 2007, i had just picked up my wife from her workplace. at approximately 5:10 p.m. est., as we were heading home we both saw a star like white light in the nnw sky. we normally don't think too much about lights of this nature because we live about 6 miles from a nearby airport, so lights from aircraft are commonplace in our area. just as we noticed this bright light, it separated into multiple lighted objects in a perfectly horizontal dispersion pattern. the original light was still there, however, now there were doubled-up lights, 3, on both the right and left side of the center light. the double lights on both sides then became elongated, and then totally disappeared from sight. this whole incident took place in a matter of about 10 seconds. i commented to my wife, "did you see that?", she replied "yes! i wonder what it was?" i thought at first that someone was shooting up fireworks, but that didn't seem likely since the lights dispersed horizontally, and didn't ark downward as fireworks normally do. i then thought that it might have been a meteor, but the sky was clear enough at the time so that there was no noticable, or discernable lighted trail behind the object. i shared these facts with my wife as we continued on home. when my wife and i got into the house, no more than 10 minutes later, i turned on the t.v. to see if there was anything on the local news channel about what had occurred. i was wondering to myself if an aircraft on approach to our local airport has exploded, and if so, would it be on our local news station. as it turned out, there was nothing on our local news station about the event either on the 6:00 p.m. or the 11:00 p.m. news. i called the national ufo reporting center to report what both my wife and i had seen, and i also filed a written report to their online center as well. i later received a phone call from peter davenport from the center, and he told me that the incident would be looked into. i also reported the incident in an email to our local news affiliate, but as of today 12\13\07, i have not received any reply.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Manheim
There were no other sightings in Manheim on or around December 12th 2007
Summary: Star like white light separating into multiple lights perfectly horizontal from center.
